UQRUG

The University of Queensland R Users Group

The University of Queensland R Users Group

UQRUG is a gathering for R users of all skills, to help each other solve problems, to share resources and tips, and to simply hang out with a nice community.

When do we meet?

We meet every last Wednesday of the month (12-2 pm, currently online and in person): sign up to the next event by searching for UQRUG on the Library training page

How do I get the Zoom link?

If you have a UQ affiliated account, you can sign up to the event directly through StudentHub:

  • UQRUG - 7 December 2022

Otherwise you can email the UQ Library training team for more help: training@library.uq.edu.au
